itemDisplayName: VM-RedHat - JBoss EAP 7.2 on RHEL 7.7 standalone mode
description: This template allows you to create a RHEL 7.7 VM running JBoss EAP 7.2 and also deploy a web application called dukes, you can login into the admin console using the EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application named dukes on JBoss EAP 7.2 running on RHEL 7.7 VM
